description: Variation of Condition 1 of listed building consent dated 3rd September 2019 (RN: 19/01995/LBC) for use of building as single family dwelling (Class C3); installation of plant machinery; internal alterations including reconfiguration of floorplans and repositioning of lift; and external alterations, including window repair and replacement of glazing. Namely, installation of safety system for maintenance of third floor roof, including building up a section of parapet wall and a new safety railing; installation of new vertical duct adjacent to existing chimney breast; replacement of existing glazing to the front fa√ßade; raising of rear courtyard floor level in line with internal levels;  replacement of existing brick buttress to lower ground Floor lightwell with a steel tie beam;  to change design of rear first floor railing; installation of external lighting; and Internal alterations, including changes to plan form and introduction of drained cavity system to lower ground floor walls.
decision_conditions: +1 Design-intrst of LB apprnce OK in CA
